name: Clash of the Dungeons
description:
Made for the Godot Wild 26 game jam with the theme of spooky. The game is more a prototype and is unfinished. You move with the ASWD keys and you can complete the game by entering the triangle on the floor.

Note: There is some issues with sound. I wasn't able to replicate it on my end but it might still be there. It's mostly glitchy and inconsistent.
